task.question: Which of the following might BEST explain the event accomplished when God creates a new heaven and a new earth? (Rev.21:1)

choices.choice: He annihilates the entire universe and then recreates it from scratch
He annihilates heaven and earth and then recreates it from scratch
He dissolves the earth and its atmosphere and then renews it clean and fresh
He annihilates all of His creation and then recreates it from scratch

task.answer: He dissolves the earth and its atmosphere and then renews it clean and fresh

task.question: New Jerusalem is the eternal city and dwelling place that God has prepared for all those who love Him. (Rev.21:2)

choices.choice: True
False

task.question: Which is a true statement concerning New Jerusalem? (Rev. 21: 3-5)

choices.choice: God will dwell there
There will be no more crying, death, sorrow, nor pain
His love shall be manifested to us and His glory put upon us
All of the above

task.question: The existence of both the river of water of life and the tree of life might be an indication that we will be “required” to eat and drink in heaven. (Rev. 22: 1-2)

choices.choice: True
False

task.question: Which of the following statements IS NOT true concerning heaven? (Rev. 22: 3-5)

choices.choice: There shall be no more curse
There shall be no night
The throne of God and of the Lamb are in it
There will no longer be a need to serve God

task.answer: There will no longer be a need to serve God

task.question: Which of the following BEST explains the “marriage supper of the Lamb”? (Rev. 19 : 9)

choices.choice: Blessed are those who are called to the marriage supper
It will commemorate the marriage between Christ and His Church and the bridal relationship between God
It will be served on earth during the Millennium
To explain the evil of marrying one's stepmother

task.answer: It will commemorate the marriage between Christ and His Church and the bridal relationship between God

task.question: Which IS NOT included as a reason why heaven explodes into a chorus of gladness and rejoicing to the glory of God? (Rev 19 : 5-8)

choices.choice: The Lord God Omnipotent reigns!
The marriage of the Lamb has come
His bride has made herself ready
None, they all explain the rejoicing and gladness

task.answer: None, they all explain the rejoicing and gladness

task.question: Which of the following IS NOT what John said as he beheld Christ about to leave heaven and return to earth? (Rev. 19:11)

choices.choice: He is called Faithful and True.
His robe was white and clean
His eyes were a flame of fire
Upon His head were many crowns

task.answer: His robe was white and clean

task.question: Which of the following applies to the resurrection? (Rev.  20: 5-6)

choices.choice: Everyone who dies will be resurrected
The saved will all resurrect before the Millennium
The unsaved will not resurrect until after the Millennium
All of the above
